typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as short,
		voornaam as string,
		achternaam as string,
		geboortedatum as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> mytestfile
source(output(
		ID as string,
		voornaam as string,
		achternaam as string,
		geboortedatum as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> db
Lookup1 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select
mytestfile, db lookup(mytestfile@voornaam == db@voornaam,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'both')~> Lookup1
Select sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ID,
		voornaam,
		achternaam,
		geboortedatum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink
